Player Command
==============

USAGE
  |   ``mail``
  |   ``mail <user>``
  |   ``mail (<group>)``

Just type "mail" from anywhere in the mud, or type "mail foo" to send
mail to someone named 'foo'.  To send mail to a group, type "mail (foo)",
where 'foo' is the name of the group you
want to send to.

.. TAGS: RST
